item.title: You’re not an influencer, you’re for sale
item.description: Be honest: Does the number of followers on platforms like Twitter matter to you? Even if you’re above average, there’s always room for more. Social media makes it very easy to compare your own profile and influence with that of others by design. We’re witnessing the effects of the attention economy. Attention is a scarce commodity so people are following strategies to get more of it, because… yeah, why? That’s an excellent question.
